review: I still prefer my Apple TV because of its more extensive content and seamless ability to stream music from iTunes. However, if you're not an Apple consumer and don't care about non-Prime content you should seriously consider Amazon Fire TV. The Amazon Fire is fast and its voice-recognition feature is excellent.

review: Better than anything else I've tried. Kids love apps. Amazon Instant video really delivers. Feels solid. Voice recognition actually works.

review: Very glad I waited to purchase a streaming player. Works as advertised! Easy to get started, quick downloads, easy to navigate. Voice remote a definite plus. Great package in a small box.
author: Amazon Customer

review: So far so good. I love how easy it is to use. The ability to talk and say what I want to see is of great delight to me. It sure does beat looking from place to place to find what I want
author: sheila smith

review: Before I purchased this I had a Roku 2 XS and enjoyed it very much. After a few years it started having issues playing some channels (even after factory reset).I bought the Fire in hopes of finding something faster and better. Well I got half of that. The Fire is amazingly fast, has some nifty features and plays games. However, it was missing several channels that I watched on the Roku with no apparent way to add them.I also found the interface to be slightly cumbersome for TV. It felt more like an Android app that I should be scrolling with my hand on a touch device.Ultimately the extra channels on the Roku are more important to me than the extra speed. So I am returning this in favor of a Roku 3.
author: Averum

review: I am completely satisfied with this purchase, the device runs fast and efficient and is a great media player. I love that it comes pre-configured and is ready to go once you hook up HDMI and power. It does not yet support HBO GO, but taking them at their word I will let them keep the 5 star rating. While I have a Chromecast, I feel this device works better and functions like a media player should. Plus I can make use of all the Amazon Instant Video purchases I have already made.
